verbose_text: Nettle leaf extract and caffeic malic acid (the major phenolic component of the extract) were shown to partially inhibit COX- and 5-lipoxygenase (5-LOX)-derived reactions; also, nettle leaf significantly reduced the release of cytokines in a concentration dependent manner, and it indirectly decreased PGE 2 synthesis, suggesting an anti-inflammatory effect.
